com.communote.server.core.messaging

Class NotificationManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.messaging.NotificationManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NotificationManagementImpl

    @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public abstract class NotificationManagementBase
extends Object
implements NotificationManagement

    Spring Service base class for MessagingManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    NotificationManagement
